items.content_html: Magnet CLI is a lightweight Node.js command-line tool that lets you search, fetch, and stream torrent videos directly using magnet links – all from your terminal. No need for external torrent clients or downloading large files manually. Just search, select, and play!
items.title: Thelofx123/magnet: Magnet CLI is a lightweight Node.js command-line tool that lets you search, fetch, and stream torrent videos directly using magnet links – all from your terminal. No need for external torrent clients or downloading large files manually. Just search, select, and play!

items.content_html: A lightweight and simple task timer to help you track time and boost productivity. Designed for developers and productivity enthusiasts, this project is featured in a YouTube tutorial. Easy to use and minimalistic. Check it out and stay on track!
